pkgmetadata.longdescription: # STEAM PySIGMAPySIGMA is a python wrapper of STEAM-SIGMA written in Java. This is repository for the source code for STEAM PySIGMA. All rights reserved.)## Released version:pip install steam-pysigma# LinksSTEAM website: https://espace.cern.ch/steam/PySIGMA documentation: https://steam-pysigma.docs.cern.chPySIGMA coverage: https://steam-pysigma.docs.cern.ch/htmlcov/# Contactsteam-team@cern.ch# STEAM User AgreementBy using any software of the STEAM framework, users agree with this document:https://edms.cern.ch/document/2024516
